alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 6:39PM PST until December 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon and North Central Oregon. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon
